game.name: Program Penguin
game.shortDescription: Slash, shoot, and slide through Program Penguin, the minimalist adventure game bursting with birds, bad puns, and enough toilet humor to surely provoke a pity laugh or two... With puns this bad even somebody's dad might start laughing!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slash, shoot, and slide through Program Penguin, the minimalist adventure game bursting with birds, bad puns, and enough toilet humor to surely provoke a pity laugh or two... With puns this bad even somebody's dad might start laughing!
